CARDINAL . In DATE ORG , meeting in GPE ( GPE ) , adopted a LAW ( “ LAW ” , A / CONF.CARDINAL/CARDINAL ( PERSON . CARDINAL ) ) intended to advance the concept of States’ rights and responsibilities with regard to the environment . “ LAW ” of this LAW provides :

“ Environmental issues are best handled with the participation of all concerned citizens , at the relevant level . ORG may be broken down into the following areas :
